Notes: A military history gallery exploring the history of warfare in the United States from the American Revolution to the present.  Also included is the DuPre gun collection, which contains over 120 different guns and firearms.  Our Homelife gallery includes late 19th and early 20th century working music boxes, a World War II era kitchen, a display on the old Cobb County courthouse and houses our temporary exhibits.  The Andrews Raiders Bedroom tells the story of the Great Locomotive Chase and the history of the Kennesaw House.  The Local History gallery explores the history of Marietta and Cobb County and includes information on the Native Americans, businesses, Bell Bomber and Scouting.
